lines.text: I'm talking about dying.
What do you mean?
I mean lying in the ground with dirt on your face and holding your breath forever.

[trying to drown]
I want to live. I want to live.
Fifty percent, Lord! I'm talking gross!

[Sonny is running away]
That man's nuts! Grab 'im!
You sure got a lotta rules about pee'in.
Sonny, you are driving me crazy!
What did you do to him?
I liked him!
Sleepig pills? Oh, Sonny, why do you need sleeping pills? If you would just go on a good diet.
Dont lecture me from classes I paid for!
What's the matter, Wendell?
I don't feel good.

[pouring a shake into a glass]
Here, why don't you drink this? It'll make you feel better.
[Wendell drinks it and then gags quietly]
Why don't you borrow some pills from your folks? They're hypocondriacs.
My folks are not hypocondriacs! You always call them hypocondriacs! They might have a couple downers, though.
Sonny, why are you here?
I told you, I have something to discuss with Julie. It's very important.
Will it depress me?
God, I hope so.
30, this morning, screaming tha the shark was after her again. I'll never forgive you for taking her to see that movie. You know she's afraid of te water anyway.
I'm sorry, Jessie. I took her to see it because she wanted to. I was trying to make her happy.
Oh, she'll say yes to look brave to you. You're so dumb.
I will not be called "dumb" by the woman that I support!
Shhh! The maid is taking a nap.
I support the maid too!
You wake up Maria, Sonny I'll...
We fired Maria!
This is another Maria!
Oh.
30 in the morning, too. Then Maria starting screaing because she thught it was the Border Patrol.
[She then notices her date arriving]
That's my date. Now will you just get out of here, please?
No.
[Jessica screams aggravately, then Sonny laughs]
Why don't do you just drop dead?
[Throws her apron at Sonny's head]

[Muffled]
I'm working on it!
Mother complex. Father complex. Feelings of inferiority. Suppressed rage. But I, and I alone, know the reason that I did it... It was because... he was so Polish!

[a bit confused]
"Polish"?

When I was a kid, I was tormented with Polish jokes. Oh, you know, "Who was Poland's Man of the Year?" - Nobody. "How do you sing the Polish National Anthem?" - Ya' don't sing it, ya' fart it. "How do you tell a Polack's identification?" - By the shit in his wallet.
[starts to sob]

[Grudgingly showing some sympathy]
Kids can be very cruel.

What "kids"? My father told me those! He was ALWAYS teasing me! He was a big, loud, hairy, sweaty... POLACK!... He was covered with sweat, always. The only man I know who could sweat... while he was swimming! And I could NEVER have friends over because... he'd challenge them to a nose-picking contest... and he always won!

[while out in the ocean]
Oh, God! Let me live, and I promise to obey every one of the Ten Commandments. I shall not kill... I shall not commit adultery... I shall not... I... uh...
[apparently forgetting the remaining eight Commandments]
I'll *learn* the Ten Commandments, and *then* I'll obey every fucking one of them!
So you got the calling?
Well, it was more of a whisper.
It's very interesting the way you woke up cursing. A large percentage of attempted suicides wake up with exclamations of hostility.
Where am I?
92% of them ask that. You're in La Playa.
The nut house?
That's a cruel label. We prefer, booby hatch.
Sane people make a lot of crazy rules. Do you like me?
[last lines]
You don't like me any more.
I like ya, Marlon. I like ya, I really do.
You do?
I do. But you gotta understand. Tell me you understand.
I understand. I love ya, Sonny. I really do.
I love ya to, Marlon.
I love ya, Sonny.
I love you too.

[hugging then Marlon suddenly pulls a knife]
Surprise!
[and chases Sonny down the beach]
Mom, I've been having trouble getting sleep lately. Do you have any sleeping pills?
Sleeping pills? I don't think we have any sleeping pills do we, Ben?
Your know darn well we have enough sleeping pills in there to put the whole Mormon Tabernacle Choir in a coma!
You're right! It's not high enough!
Do you think we'll ever change to the metric system?
